definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: A grading and styling design of garment pattern pieces is described in a top-down way.
sentences.chinese: 介绍服装样片分类和款式的自顶向下设计方法。

sentences.english: The top-down management support should not be confused with the rollout approach.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下的管理支持不应该与铺展过程相混淆。

sentences.english: You could also embed the sideway approach within the top-down or bottom-up approach.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以在自顶向下或自底向上方法中嵌入旁路方法。

sentences.english: And top-down, means problem to architecture to solution.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下，意味着从问题，到架构，再到解决方案。

sentences.english: The top-down inductive program synthesis is based on the method of identification by enumeration.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下的归纳程序综合基于枚举识认方法。

sentences.english: However, it is rare for an architecture to be totally driven from the top down.
sentences.chinese: 然而，很少有体系架构是完完全全的自顶向下的。

sentences.english: The top-down approach is to implement the data warehouse in a single project phase.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下的方法就是在单个项目阶段中实现数据仓库。

sentences.english: They also agree the top-down approach requires much more business involvement.
sentences.chinese: 他们也认同自顶向下的方法需要更多业务的介入。

sentences.english: Visit the Top down application development feature.
sentences.chinese: 访问自顶向下应用程序开发特性。

sentences.english: The example in this article follows a top-down approach.
sentences.chinese: 本文中的示例遵循自顶向下的方法。

sentences.english: The final results of the query are then pulled from the top.
sentences.chinese: 随后自顶向下地提取本查询的最终结果。

sentences.english: Now, let's take a look at the top-down approach from a logical perspective.
sentences.chinese: 现在，让我们从逻辑的角度来研究自顶向下方法。
